attributes.action: Ban fish and live stock being sold in pet shops.
attributes.additional_details: I believe that the Government/Parliament have the power to enforce this Law, but also should want to do something about.
attributes.background: I would like the Government/Parliament to forbid fish from being sold at pet stores. The reason being is because I recently left a pet store feeling upset from seeing too many fish in one tank, looking very distressed. It is an act of animal cruelty therefore something must be done about this.
